summary: Completed comprehensive testing of WayofDojo features: Login flow, Admin panel, Dashboard Dojo, and Stages page. All features working correctly. Backend: 10/10 tests PASSED. Frontend: All requested features verified.
critical_code_review_comments: Login flow works correctly with testninja2@ninja.com / Password123!
Redirection to /dojo after login works as expected
Admin page accessible only for admin/super_admin roles - properly protected
Admin Dashboard shows statistics: Total users, New users (7j), Active users (7j), Admins count
Admin Users tab shows user list with role change dropdown
Stages page has 3 view modes: Grid, List, Calendar - all working
Level filters (Tous niveaux, Débutant, Intermédiaire, Avancé) work correctly
Dashboard Dojo shows all required sections including Défis du jour with XP rewards
Les 7 Vertus du Budo section displays all 7 virtues with progress bars
Derniers accomplissements section shows recent achievements
Maître Tanaka visible on all pages (Dojo, Stages)
MOCKED: Stages data is static in frontend (MOCK_STAGES array in stages/page.tsx)
seed_data_creation: None - uses existing test user testninja2@ninja.com
context_for_next_testing_agent: WayofDojo multi-sport SaaS platform tested. Login: testninja2@ninja.com / Password123! (super_admin role). Admin panel at /fr/admin with Dashboard, Utilisateurs, Paramètres tabs. Dojo dashboard at /fr/aikido/dojo with user stats, weekly stats, quick actions, daily challenges, 7 Vertus du Budo with progress bars, and recent achievements. Stages page at /fr/aikido/stages with Grid/List/Calendar views and level filters. IMPORTANT: Stages data is MOCKED in frontend.

login_flow.details: Login with testninja2@ninja.com / Password123! works, redirects to /dojo

Défis du jour with 6 challenges and XP rewards

Level filters (Tous niveaux, Débutant, Intermédiaire, Avancé)
